title: Kids making decisions
creator_credit: Tony Paice, Corporate Relations Unit and Victoria. Inner City School Support Centre
brief_description: A program for primary teachers highlighting key features in developing integrated curriculum. An integrated curriculum goes beyond a thematic approach and involves coordinating all curriculum areas around one chosen topic to promote the development of learning. Shows teachers and their classes in three Western Metropolitan schools involved in choosing a topic, ordering concept areas and contributing questions. The pupils are involved by taking responsibility for their own learning in making key decisions.
